DOC.brief_summary: Hepatitis B prevention non-responders uraemic patient currently base HBsAg surveillance isolation HBsAg carrier . A immunogenic vaccine would benefit population .
DOC.brief_title: Compare Immune Response & Safety Elicited Henogen 's Adjuvanted Hepatitis B Vaccine v Aventis Pasteur MSD 's Hepatitis B Vaccine Pre-Dialysis & Dialysis Patients Who Did Not Respond Previous Hepatitis B Vaccination
DOC.detailed_description: Study participant receive either Henogen 's adjuvanted hepatitis B vaccine Aventis Pasteur 's hepatitis B vaccine . The study involve total 4 visit blood sample take visit .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria A male female subject great equal 15 year age time study entry Written inform consent obtain subject/ parent guardian subject . Seronegative antiHBc antibody HBsAg screening . Predialysis patient , peritoneal dialysis patient haemodialysis patient Documented evidence previous hepatitis B vaccination least one full primary vaccination course minimum four injection license vaccine . The last dose administer least two month plan first dose study vaccine study . Documented evidence nonresponse previous hepatitis B vaccination least one maximum three month last vaccine dose . Exclusion criterion Subject include HN014/HBV001 study . History Hepatitis B infection Use immunoglobulin within six month precede first study vaccination . Any confirm suspected human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection . Pregnant lactate female
